Image Analysis Tools¶

Mix of functions used for image processing and data extraction.

imageTools.Blurr(Image, sigma)¶

Perofrms a gaussian blurr on Image with standard deviation sigma.

imageTools.Compare(ImageArray, ColorBarArray=None, TitleArray=None)¶

Places images side by side for comparsion.

imageTools.ConstructOverlay(Image1, Image2)¶

Takes 2 images and overlays them for disply.

imageTools.Dilate(Image, numberoftimes)¶

Performs binary dilation on Image a required number of times.

imageTools.DistanceTransform(Image)¶

Takes distance transform of image.

imageTools.Erode(Image, numberoftimes)¶

Performs binary erosion of image a required number of times.

imageTools.Fill(Image)¶

Fills in whole in connected reigons in Image.

imageTools.FolderCompare(FolderName)¶

Compares all images in a folder on screen.

imageTools.GlobalThreshold(Image)¶

Simple threshold of image using single threshold value over whole image.

imageTools.Label(Image)¶

Labels each connected reigon in Image with a different number

imageTools.Open(pathname)¶

Returns numpy array of image at pathname.

imageTools.Save(Image, pathname)¶

Saves image to pathname as png.

imageTools.SavePlot(filename)¶

Saves plot to pathname as png.

imageTools.Setup(InputFolder, OutputFolder)¶

Creates output folder if it doesnt exist and get input file named from input file.

imageTools.Show()¶

Shows image at run time.

imageTools.SiveArea(Image, smallest=0, largest=1000000000.0)¶

Removes connected reigons smller than smallest and larger than largest in Image.

imageTools.Skeletonize(Image)¶

Reduces Image to a skeleton.

imageTools.Threshold(Image, blockSize)¶

Performs an adaptive threshold on Image. Threshold value is obtained by averaging pixels in each small reigon the size of which is given by blocksize.

imageTools.WaterShed(Image)¶

Performs water shed transform on Image. Useful for segmentation of connected reigons.
